name: Paraffine

Eyes: Sensation as if there were fat on the eyes
Stomach: Pain in stomach alternates with pain in throat and spine, extends to chest with belching
Fixed pain in left hypochondrium, as if parts were being twisted
Head: Left side of head and face suffer most; pains stinging and twisting
Pain as if a nail were driven in left side of vertex
Twisting in left ear
Abdomen: Pain in lower abdomen, extending to genitals, rectum and coccyx; better, sitting
Mouth: Tearing, twisting pain in teeth down to lower jaw
Full of saliva; feels sticky; bitter taste
Female: Nipples pain when touched, as if sore inside
Very hot urine with burning pains in vulva
Skin: Burns, even of third degree, with sloughing and sepsis
Wash with sterile water and dry and spray with paraffine, and cover with thin layer of cotton
Rectum: Chronic constipation, with hemorrhoids and continual urging to stool, without result
Extremities: Pain in spine extending to inguinal region and in both loins, when ascending the stairs
Feeling of electric shocks in all joints
Wrenching pain in calves, extending into toes, in joints
Feet swollen with tearing in ankles and soles

details: Valuable in uterine affections. Particularly serviceable, in constipation. Knife-like pains. Pains extend from one part to another, and alternate. Pain in stomach alternates with pain in throat and spine.
